ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard sit in scheduled
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes I too missed hearing about it until  Monday morning. Kit ... From: Olgwinn Pendragun [mailto:olgwinn@hotmail.com] Sent: Monday, September 18, 2000 8:12 AM
ygData.messageBody:
Yes I too missed hearing about it until Monday morning.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Olgwinn Pendragun [mailto:olgwinn@...]
Sent: Monday, September 18, 2000 8:12 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Bard sit in scheduled



Well, I probably would have gone to it as well, unfortunately I didn't hear
about the event until it had already been over for some time. Even
EQ.Stratics had the message about the event posted on it's site a good 7
hours after the event was over.

Perhaps we should try this again and plan it well in advance... How about
NEXT Sunday (ie. Sept. 24).


Olgwinn Pendragun
Bard of 45 Missed Notes
E'ci


> Date: Sun, 17 Sep 2000 23:04:17 -0500
> From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
>Subject: Re: Bard sit in scheduled
>
>Well, I was late - but I was there. Not much turnout from what I heard, so
>perhaps we can get together with the other mailing lists and the message
>boards and the news pages and get some more support.
>
>Not like it does any good :P
>
>
>BTW - for those interested, I've updated my EQ Commands page - a listing of
>all available / commands in Everquest. You can find it at
>http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/everquest/eqcommands.htm
>
>Keep on singing!
>Talies
>
